verses.text: Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w Nob|strong="H5011"\w* to \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: and \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* was \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w* at the \w meeting|strong="H7125"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Why \add art\add* thou alone, and no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* with thee?\f + \fr 21.1 \ft Ahimelech: also called Ahiah\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* me a \w business|strong="H1697"\w*, and hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Let no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* any \w thing|strong="H3972"\w* of the \w business|strong="H1697"\w* whereabout I \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee, and what I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee: and I have \w appointed|strong="H3045"\w* \add my\add* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* to \w such|strong="H6423"\w* and \w such|strong="H0492"\w* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

Now therefore what \w is|strong="H3426"\w* under thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*? \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add me\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \add loaves of\add* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* in mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, or what there is \w present|strong="H4672"\w*.\f + \fr 21.3 \ft present: Heb. found\f*

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add There is\add* no \w common|strong="H2455"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* under mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, but there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w hallowed|strong="H6944"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*; if the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* have \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* themselves at \w least|strong="H0389"\w* from \w women|strong="H0802"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Of a \w truth|strong="H0518"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \add have been\add* \w kept|strong="H6113"\w* from us about these \w three|strong="H8032"\w* \w days|strong="H8543"\w*, since I came \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* are \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, and \add the bread is\add* in a \w manner|strong="H1870"\w* \w common|strong="H2455"\w*, yea, though it were \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in the \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*.\f + \fr 21.5 \ft yea…: or, especially when this day there is other sanctified in the vessel\f*

So the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him \w hallowed|strong="H6944"\w* \add bread:\add* for there was no \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* there but the \w shewbread|strong="H3899"\w*, that was \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w hot|strong="H2527"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when it was taken \w away|strong="H3947"\w*.

Now a certain \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \add was\add* there that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w detained|strong="H6113"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w*, an \w Edomite|strong="H0130"\w*, the \w chiefest|strong="H0047"\w* of the \w herdmen|strong="H7462"\w* that \add belonged\add* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w*, And is \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w not|strong="H0371"\w* here under thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* or \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*? for I have neither \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* nor my \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* with \w me|strong="H3027"\w*, because the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w business|strong="H1697"\w* \w required|strong="H1961"\w* \w haste|strong="H5169"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of \w Goliath|strong="H1555"\w* the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*, whom thou \w slewest|strong="H5221"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w*, behold, it \add is here\add* \w wrapped|strong="H3874"\w* in a \w cloth|strong="H8071"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*: if thou wilt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* that, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add it:\add* for \add there is\add* no \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w save|strong="H2108"\w* that \w here|strong="H2088"\w*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add There is\add* none like that; \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it me.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* for \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*.

And the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \add Is\add* not this \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*? did they not \w sing|strong="H6030"\w* one to another of \w him|strong="H2088"\w* in \w dances|strong="H4246"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* hath \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* his \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his ten \w thousands|strong="H7233"\w*?

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* laid \w up|strong="H7760"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and was \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*.

And he \w changed|strong="H8138"\w* his \w behaviour|strong="H2940"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* them, and feigned himself \w mad|strong="H1984"\w* in their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w scrabbled|strong="H8427"\w* on the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and let his \w spittle|strong="H7388"\w* fall \w down|strong="H3381"\w* upon his \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*.\f + \fr 21.13 \ft scrabbled: or, made marks\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, Lo, ye \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* is \w mad|strong="H7696"\w*: wherefore \add then\add* have ye \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him to me?\f + \fr 21.14 \ft is mad: or, playeth the mad man\f*

Have I \w need|strong="H2638"\w* of mad \w men|strong="H7696"\w*, that ye have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* this \add fellow\add* to play the mad \w man|strong="H7696"\w* in my presence? shall this \add fellow\add* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into my \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?
